title: Amazing value great quality fabulous location
text: We did not know what to expect for the reasonable price we paid. Would it be a dump? As it turns out, the rooms were impeccably decorated - though quite small. The location could not be beat. Right in the heart of the Magnificent Mile - walking distance to many attractions. The breakfast at the hotel was quite expensive, but there is a lovely irish pub called The Elephant and Castle right on the corner which has a plentiful and reasonably-priced breakfast.. We traveled with our 5 children, and had a lovely stay. Would definitely return there.
